name: Notion Productivity Kit
description: Get more things done with NotionThe Productivity Kit is a new system built to help you prioritize your work, cut out clutter, and get things done. With this Notion template you will be able to manage your tasks, projects, habits and more without losing focus. The intent is to bring the most important details front and center so you can be efficient and save time while making progress toward your goals.Video walkthroughThe all-in-one Notion productivity setupThe Productivity Kit is the perfect so
features: Daily plannerOrganize your to-do list and stay organized.; Task managerSet deadlines and get things done.; Project managerCreate projects, set deadlines, complete tasks.; Habit tracker (automated)Build new habits to improve your daily life.; Task prioritizationIdentify your most important tasks daily.; Weekly reportsRecognize accomplishments and reflect on your week.; SpacesEasily categorize your work and organize your life.; Focus mode areaCut out distractions and complete tasks.; Calendar viewSee your schedule at a birds-eye-view.; Notes databaseStore important information and resources.
